CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Last_Activity_on_Lead_Contact__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Last_Activity_on_Lead_Contact__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Last Activity Age
